entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
